Translations.Text: Wo que yi youdai a dan de houyi, er shi tamen zai lushang huo haishang du you suo qi cheng, wo yi jiamei de shiwu gongji tamen, wo shi tamen dada di chaoguo wo suo chuangzao de xuduo ren.
(Ni ji zhu,) zai na ri, wo jiang zhaohuan mei ge minzu ji qi biaoshuai. Yi youshou jieshou qi gongguo bu zhe, jiang yuedu ziji de benzi; tamen bu shou yi sihao kui she.
Zai jinshi shi mangren zhe, zai houshi reng shi mangren, erqie gengjia mi wu.
Tamen que yi shi ni jihu weibei wo suo qishi de jiaoxun, yibian ni jiajie wo de mingyi, er niezao qita de jiaoxun. Name tamen jiu hui ba ni dang pengyou.
Yao bushi wo shi ni jianding, ni jihu yi qingxiang yu tamenle.
Ruguo nayang, wo bi shi ni zai shengqian changshi jiabei de xingfa, zai sihou changshi jiabei de xingfa, shi ni buneng zhaodao renhe ren bangzhu ni lai duikang wo.
Tamen que yi shi ni jihu buneng anju guxiang, yibian ba ni zhu chu jingwai. Ruguo nayang, tamen zai ni bei zhu zhihou, zhide douliu yihui'er.
Zhe shi zai ni zhiqian wo suo paiqian de zhong shizhe de changdao, ni duiyu wo de changdao buneng faxian renhe biangeng.
Ni yingdang jin shou cong chen shi dao heiye de bai gong; bing yingdang jin shou zaochen de bai gong, zaochen de bai gong que shi bei canjia de.
Zai yeli de yiduan shijian, ni yingdang jin shou ni suo dang shou de fujia de bai gong, zhu huoxu ba ni ti dao yige zhide chengsong di diwei.
Ni shuo:`Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni shi wo shunli er ru, qiu ni shi wo shunli er chu, qiu ni shangci wo cong ni nali fachu de quanbing, yi zuo wo de fubi.'
Ni shuo:`Zhenli yi lailinliao, xuwang yi xiaomiele; xuwang que shi yi mie de.'
Wo jiang shi keyi wei xinshimen zhiliao he gei tamen yi enhui de “gulanjing”, ta zhi hui shi bu xindao zhe gengjia kui she.
Dang wo shi en yu ren de shihou, ta diaotou bugu; dang ta zaoyu huohuan de shihou, ta biancheng juewang de.
Ni shuo:`Ge ren yi ziji de fangfa er gongzuo, nimen de zhu zui zhidao shui shi geng jin yu zhengdao de.'
Tamen wen ni jingshen shi shenme? Ni shuo:`Jingshen shi wo de zhu de jimi.'Nimen zhi huode hen shao de zhishi.
Ruguo wo yiyu, wo shi bi ba wo qishi ni de (“gulanjing”) xiaomie jingjin, ranhou, ni dui wo buneng faxian renhe jianhu zhe.
Dan wo wei cong ni de zhu fachu de enhui (cai baocun ta), ni de zhu suo shi yu ni de enhui shizhongda de.
Ni shuo:`Ruguo renlei he jingling lianhe qilai chuangzao yi bu xiang zheyang de “gulanjing”, namo, tamen jishi huxiang bangzhu, ye bi buneng chuangzao xiang zheyang de miao wen.'
Zai zhe bu “gulanjing” li, wo wei zhongren que yi shenshu gezhong biyu, dan zhongren daban buxin.
Tamen shuo:`Women jue buxin ni, zhidao ni wei women er shi yidao yuanquan cong dixia yongchu,
huozhe ni youyizuo yuanpu, zhongzhizhe ye zao he pu tao, ni shi heliu guanchuan qijian;
huozhe ni shi tian ru ni suo shuo di nayang, yikuai kuai di luo zai women de toushang; huozhe ni qing zhenzhu he zhong tianshen lai (yu women) jianmian;

huozhe ni you yi suo huangjin wu; huozhe ni sheng shangtian qu, women jue buxin ni que yi shengtian, zhidao ni jiang shi women suo neng yuedu de jingdian.'Ni shuo:`Zansong wo de zhu chaojue wanwu! Wo zhishi yige ceng feng shiming de fanren.'
Dang zhengdao jianglin zhongren de shihou, fang'ai tamen xindao de zhishi tamen de zhe ju hua:`Nandao zhenzhu paiqian yige fanren lai zuo shizhe ma?'
Ni shuo:`Jiaruo dadishang you xuduo tianshen anran buxing, namo wo bi cong tianshang jiangxia yige tianshen qu tamen nali zuo shizhe.'
Ni shuo:`Zhenzhu zu wei wo yu nimen zhi jian de jianzheng, ta duiyu ta de pu renmen que shi che zhi de, que shi mingcha de.'

Zhenzhu yindao shui, shui jiushi zunxun zhengdao de; zhenzhu shi shui mi wu, ni buneng wei shui faxian zhenzhu yiwai de baohu zhe. Zai fuhuo ri, wo jiang shi tamen you xia you ya you long de pufuzhe jihe qilai, tamen de guisu shi huo yu. Mei dang huoshi jianruo de shihou, wo zengjia tamen de huoyan.
Zhe shi tamen de baochou, yinwei tamen buxin wo de jixiang, bingqie shuo:`Women biancheng kugu he chentu hou, nandao women yiding hui bei fuhuo cheng xinren ma?'
